step.p: Slice the mushrooms and crush the garlic clove.
Heat the olive oil in a large non-stick frying pan, then fry the garlic over a low heat for 1 min or until smoke develops.
Add the mushrooms and cook until soft.
If the kale wonâ€™t all fit in the pan, add half and stir until wilted, then add the rest.
Once all the kale is wilted, season.

fxd:addition.p: Now crack in the eggs and keep them cooking gently for 2-3 mins.

step.p: Cover with the lid to for a further 2-3 mins or until the eggs are cooked to your liking.
